TopicTitle: [Youtube series] The Pegasus Munar Research Base

Articles.Content:
Reply to this thread with your submissions!

I may even post them at http://www.youtube.com/user/DrBurndred.

Rules

You post a good ship, it goes in my Youtube series and you get credited for it!

YOU MUST have a good launch stage and a description on how to use it

I also need some screenshots of your ship on the mun, I don't like flying ships I've never seen before.

It must work! I don't want to get stuck in orbit of Kerbin. I won't be happy :mad:

You must use all LITTLE parts as possible.

I want lot's of friendly Kerbals on the Mun, please have as much crew as possible, unless it is a probe!

I need a good landing stage and good control, RCS recommended.

Get the base here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/stock-parts-only-the-pegasus-s-munar-research-base/

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y_yjolXxHW4&list=TL1RnHm44gPOM

No mods either, it has to be all stock parts.

Thanks for reading!

See you on the Mun!

Edited September 27, 2013 by ToSpaceWeGo!

And the challenge is: make me a craft.

Edited July 25, 2013 by DesertWolf
The Pegasus will soon be up for download. You could add it to your series and do a shoutout to my channel.
Need ships! this series needs to start.
Gimmie 24 hours. Can we get an acceptable mod list?

There's a lot of I in your post, making it sound like a request thread and not a challenge. What exactly is the challenge? How is it scored, are there any requirements or limitations, etc. The way I read it you're really just asking us to build stuff for you, not to compete against eachother or even challenge ourselves.
It is not scored, it's more of a request thread as you said. People post their Mun landers/bases to me and I put it in my Youtube series. There is requirements, I'll gp over my list of them now.
